CustomField.description: Unique ID for the Pricing Plan. This field matches the value we receive in ZP Product Lines. For the base product, this is the tier ID and for the add ons, this is the add on pricing plan ID.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unique ID for the Pricing Plan. This field matches the value we receive in ZP Product Lines. For the base product, this is the tier ID and for the add ons, this is the add on pricing plan ID.
CustomField.label: Pricing Plan ID
